stealing my text and photos is lame...please dont do it! PROJECT BRIEFING: HOLIDAY 2013_RAPIDWELD
Durable stitchless (no sew) outer shells lined with comfort enhanced neoprene inner glove construction on two of the most enduring and iconic skate silhouettes of all time. Vans® Rapidweld™ and Luxliner™ technologies combine in this Syndicate pack to create the ultimate blend of classic style and advanced performance. · RapidWeld™ stitchless synthetic leather in high-abrasion areas · RapidWeld™ stitchless reflective sidestripe and tongue logo details · LuxLiner™ tongue and vamp inner glove lining construction · UltraCush™ Lite footbed · Ballistic nylon quarter panels · Vulcanized foxing tape and crystal clear waffle tread pattern stealing my text and photos is lame... please dont do it!!! ----- second set of laces are flat / white . AVAILABLE TO SHIP INSIDE USA ONLY! (please email us for more information.)

name: VANS SYNDICATE_024.152 DEFCON / SK8-HI NOTCHBACK PRO "S"
description:
RESTOCKED

ONE SKU PER CUSTOMER
 At this time, and in order to attempt to get these into the hands of those that will actually wear them, we are only allowed to sell a maximum of 1 qty per style to a customer, and are unable to ship out of USA territory. Any orders breaking these rules will be cancelled. (So you will be allowed one sk8-hi and one old skool maximum.)
All orders will be shipped w/in 48 hours of reception, in the order that they are received.

stealing my text and photos is lame...please dont do it! PROJECT BRIEFING: HOLIDAY 2013_DEFCON
DEFCON members stay under the radar and out of the community's eye, letting their projects and reputation represent them. They concentrate on the visual construction of their own heartfelt passions. This holiday DEFCON comes up for air to reinforce their partnership with Vans and the special individuals that make up the Syndicate family. Any further details are currently classified. . name: VANS SYNDICATE_023.147 SK8-HI '91 PRO "S" :::(WADE SPEYER) BLACK:::
description:
RESTOCKED!

PRODUCT BRIEFING: 023.147 STYLE: SK8-HI '91 PRO "S" COLOR: (WADE SPEYER) BLACK MTL #: VN-0UA68WC stealing my text and photos is lame... please dont do it!!! WADE SPEYER PACK: It is with great honor that Syndicate presents O.G. Vans team rider, Wade Speyer’s exclusive Syndicate pack this fall. In the Nineties, Wade Speyer was a pioneer among a new generation of skateboarders that gave rise to the likes of Vans legend John Cardiel [Wade is Cardiel’s all-time favorite skateboarder] and continues to this day in the all-terrain terrors of Tony Trujillo and his ilk. Equally at home skating transitions as he was out in the streets, Wade’s path of destruction led to the first documented trick on S.F.’s infamous Hubba Hideout (R.I.P.)and multiple covers of Thrasher magazine, seemingly every other month, until it all ended abruptly, and too soon for those of us here at Syndicate, when Wade chose to walk and not fade away. Wade decided to work with two classically inspired silhouettes, the Sk8-Hi ’91 Pro “S” and Sk8-Low “S”, with Wade’s signature flannel-printed linings and custom graphics package. stealing my text and photos is lame... please dont do it!!! ----- second set of laces are flat / black. comes packaged with flannel dust bag and coozie. AVAILABLE TO SHIP INSIDE USA ONLY! (please email us for more information.)

name: VANS SYNDICATE_023.141 SK8-HI OG "S" :::(ICE-T) BLACK:::
description:
INDEX #: 023.141 STYLE: SK8-HI OG “S” MATERIALS: PREMIUM SUEDE / CANVAS COLOR: (ICE-T) BLACK MTL #: VN-0PW7AN4 stealing my text and photos is lame... please dont do it!!! PROJECT BRIEFING: RHYME SYNDICATE Vans Syndicate proudly presents the one and only true O.G. godfather of West Coast gangster rap, former Crenshaw gangster pimp turned social commentator, Grammy Award winning mid-eighties founder of early hip-hop collective Rhyme Syndicate, the ever controversial and never complacent, acclaimed actor and respected metal head, Tracy Marrow, otherwise known as Ice-T. Ice put his stamp on this Syndicate project with an O.G. theme in two directions as Ice-T describes them: “One’s more gangster. One’s more pimp.”
The “more gangster” model is Ice’s Sk8-Hi OG “S” in traditional black suede and white canvas with Slauson Swap Meet-style embroidered fixings (Body Count, OG, Rhyme Syndicate and Ice-T), pigskin linings and sockliners stamped with Ice’s lyrics in gold foil throughout. stealing my text and photos is lame... please dont do it!!! ----- second set of laces are flat / white. comes packaged in custom drawer style box w/ body bag dust bag. Project 023.143 Gun keychain / Gift included with shoes. AVAILABLE TO SHIP INSIDE USA ONLY! (please email us for more information.)

name: VANS SYNDICATE_023.141 CHUKKA DECON "S" :::(ICE-T) BLACK:::
description:
INDEX #: 023.141 STYLE: CHUKKA DECON “S” MATERIALS: PREMIUM NUBUCK COLOR: (ICE-T) BLACK MTL #: VN-0VIMAN5 stealing my text and photos is lame... please dont do it!!! PROJECT BRIEFING: RHYME SYNDICATE Vans Syndicate proudly presents the one and only true O.G. godfather of West Coast gangster rap, former Crenshaw gangster pimp turned social commentator, Grammy Award winning mid-eighties founder of early hip-hop collective Rhyme Syndicate, the ever controversial and never complacent, acclaimed actor and respected metal head, Tracy Marrow, otherwise known as Ice-T. Ice put his stamp on this Syndicate project with an O.G. theme in two directions as Ice-T describes them: “One’s more gangster. One’s more pimp.”
For Ice’s “more pimp” model, he chose a Chukka Decon “S”. Featuring an added heel pull with “OG” embroidery on an otherwise deconstructed upper with elegantly perforated quarter panels, the Chukka Decon “S” is composed of high quality nubuck and tonal labeling and also featuring pigskin linings and sockliners stamped with Ice’s lyrics in gold foil throughout. stealing my text and photos is lame... please dont do it!!! ----- second set of laces are round, waxed / black. comes packaged in custom drawer style box w/ body bag dust bag. name: SILO + MIKE HILL CRUISER MODEL
description: Designed by Silo to commemorate Mike Hill's Vans Syndicate release, we are proud to offer this small batch of cruiser boards manufactured by The Alien Workshop, exclusively for us. Graphics tie in to the box art featured on his shoe project. To find out more about Mike Hill see our feature here ! 7.56" at the widest point 30.5" long 5.5" nose 6.25" tail 13.75" wheelbase A custom cruiser shape, featuring a fuller, boxy nose for a more functional response. This thing is a blast in the streets... MADE TO MATCH THE FOLLOWING PRODUCTS: SILO + MIKE HILL TEE VANS SYNDICATE_022.133 SK8-HI BOOT "S" (MIKE HILL / DARK GREEN / VANILLA) VANS SYNDICATE_022.133 AUTHENTIC PRO "S" (MIKE HILL / MINT / VANILLA)

name: Jason Markk Shoe Care
description:
-Starter kit Includes 4 oz. Premium Shoe Cleaner and Standard Shoe Cleaning Brush packaged in resealable, Jason Markk fresh pouch.

4 oz. Premium Sneaker Solution
Does not contain any harsh chemicals or abrasives
98.3% Natural and completely biodegradable
Safe on all colors and materials
Effectively cleans and conditions
Cleans up to 100 pairs of sneakers
Standard Sneaker Cleaning Brush
Synthetic bristle
Handcrafted wood block brush
Laser-etched Jason Markk logo on handle
Excellent for tackling dirt on midsoles
Great for all-around cleaning
Tough on stubborn stains


NOTE: When cleaning premium leather, suede, nubuck, nylon, cotton mesh and other delicate materials take extra care and be gentle. We highly recommend using our Premium Shoe Cleaning Brush. The softer hog bristles are better suited for use on delicate surfaces.

also available:

-PREMIUM MICROFIBER TOWEL (best absorption and is non- abrasive)

-PREMIUM SHOE CLEANING BRUSH (softer hog bristle, for cotton, suede, etc)

-8 OZ. REFILL SHOE CLEANER (approx 200 cleanings!)

SHIPPING FOR JASON MARKK PRODUCTS IS FREE WHEN PURCHASED WITH ANY FOOTWEAR IN STORE! ($8.00 if purchased separately)

name: SILO GIFT CARD
description:
THE BEST GIFT YOU COULD EVER GIVE IS LOVE. THE SECOND BEST IS A GIFT CARD FROM SILO.

Please make a note in the order if you want it to be mailed to someone else, and include their name and information. Otherwise this will ship to your payment address and the name will be left blank.

free shipping on gift cards! 

A great gift that can be used on any item in store.

<font size="1" color="666666">It never expires, and there are no unnecessary fees or any hassles. non-transferable, not redeemable for cash.</font>

name: SILO + THUNDER TRUCKS
description:
THE WARRIOR EDITION THUNDER LIGHTS, BY SILO!
We chose to go the extra mile and make these in the LIGHT style.
 - MADE IN THE USA -

QUICKER, LIGHTER, STRONGER

FEATURING:
AIRCRAFT GRADE ALUMINUM FORGED BASEPLATE
HOLLOW POINT CHROMOLLY KINGPIN
POLISHED HANGER W/ SILO ARTWORK
ANODIZED BLACK BASEPLATE
ALL BLACK HARDWARE/BUSHING SET

Available in 2 sizes>
the traditional 145mm low (board sizes 7.25-7.87)
the newly redesigned 147 hi 2. (board sizes 7.9-8.4)

This is a great chance to pick up an upgraded classic in the 145, or get in on the newly launched 147 hi 2. The 147 has "True Fit" bushing seats, a remastered design for the quickest response available, and reinforced construction where it counts- guaranteed by Thunder to last.
